title: Higher Education Adults' Media Utilization Strategies: Digital Transformation in Language Learning Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital tools and foundational knowledge of language learning
context.additional_context: Need for Customized Media-Literacy Education Reflecting Adult Learnersâ€™ Work/Life Experiences

learning_goals: Learners can compare and analyze three or more mobile-based language learning apps within two weeks and select tools suitable for their learning style
Learners can diagnose their digital media usage types (entertainment/peripheral/advanced/tool-based) and develop strategic usage plans to enhance language learning efficiency
Learners can perform peer language practice activities at least twice weekly using digital content (podcasts, videos, collaboration tools) in a blended environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
